title: (x) "Computer Service" heavy pen or brush style script - Matura Scriptorial Capitals {Yves}
content:
Here is another one of those I cannot find - maybe free? Ugh

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cs.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604064746/http:/typophile.com/files/cs.jpg) | 10.78 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: Nah, that’s a Monotype classic — [Imre Reiner](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Imre%20Reiner)’s [Matura Scriptorial Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604064746/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.6410.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Computer+Service&sampleSize=32), stretched.
Oh yeah, I didn’t care for that font when I saw it on one of my pc’s and promptly deactivated it.
